title: Two sermons preached at Paules-Crosse London The one November 21. the other Aprill 15. 1627. By Robert Saunderson, Bachelour in Divinitie, and sometimes Fellow of Lincolne Colledge in Oxford.
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. F[awcet] for Robert Dawlman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,
